item.description:
9th Annual Shamrock Run & Walk
March 19, 2011
551 Peacedale Street
Bristol, CT
________________________

2 Mile Run, 2 Mile Fitness Walk, 5 Mile Run & Kids Fun Run

First Event starts at 9:30 AM

$22.00 Registration Fee except for kids fun run $5.00, Fee changes to $25.00 after 3/12/2011

Lots of stuff being given away for everyone registered ! Craziest Costume Contest- WIN A Sports Version Wii

Each year the after party gets better and better- Hamburgers & Hot dogs, Fruit and much more....We have AWESOME race bags filled with GREAT useful stuff !

Parking- Get to the race area early- there is plenty of parking but its scattered around the welcome center/school area. Please park on James P. Casey adjacent to the school grounds.

Contact Name and Contact Information: Patrick Collins 860.585.8649 or PCIRISHC5@AOL.com

Last years 8th Annual Shamrock Run & Walk was a huge success which was evidenced by the committee presenting a check for $12,000 to the shelter and hosting over 1800 athletes. Not only was it a great fundraising event for the shelter it helped raise awareness within the community of the good work being done for those less fortunate. Since the race inception in 2003 the event has raised over $94,000 for the shelter.

An Irish Blessing

May you be poor in misfortune,
rich in blessings,
slow to make enemies,
quick to make friends,
but rich or poor,
quick or slow,
may you know nothing but happiness
from this day forward.

________________________

For registration:

http://bristolct.net/...

________________________

This is Sam Z! Time to get your lazy asses in the gym. The 2-mile race or 2-mile walk start at 9:40 am. So get there nice & early. The 5-mile race starts at 10:30 am. Last year, we ate afterwards at a local restaurant.

For anyone who wants to carpool: There is the huge parking lot at Target, 475 Hartford Road, New Britain, CT 06053. Take exit 39A off Route 9 South. Then a quick right & Target is on your left. We can meet there 8:20 AM (email me).
item.name: 9th Annual Shamrock Road Race
